items.name: Houmous with PERi-PERi Drizzle
items.description: Pour smoky PERi-PERi oil over creamy houmous and dig in with strips of warm pitta

items.name: Red Pepper Dip
items.description: Dive in to roasted red pepper and chilli spice dip with warm pitta strips.

items.name: Spicy Mixed Olives
items.description: Try them once and you’ll be a fan forever.

items.name: PERi-PERi Nuts
items.description: Fiery almonds, cashews and macadamias - crunch with punch

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Golden brown and deliciously garlicky, with a touch of heat.

items.name: 3 Chicken Wings
items.description: Curb your craving with a PERi-PERi taster.
